Projects

Statistics and Advanced Statistics Tests in Applied Linguistics with R

In these projects, I have conducted various statistical analyses in the cotnext of Applied Linguistics, implementing these analyses using R, a powerful statistical programming language. You can find the code and detailed documentation for this project on my GitHub. Feel free to explore the repository and provide any feedback or suggestions.
